name: Craigbot-Cogs
author: 90s_Craig (<@90s_Craig>)
description: Welcome to 90s_Craig's cog repository for Red-DiscordBot. Here, you'll find a variety of cogs crafted with a focus on enhancing your Discord server's functionality and fun. [GitHub](https://github.com/90sCraig/Craigbot-Cogs)
install_msg: Thank you for installing 90s_Craig's repo! Your support means a lot. For further details on these cogs or to share any suggestions/bug reports, feel free to join our Discord community at [90s_Craig's Discord](https://discord.gg/2ScyEk2Nnz).
